name: Jetpack Hop
description:
Jetpack Hop will have you aiming high!

In this addictive game your aim is to travel as far as you can by tapping on the screen to jump and holding down to use up your jetpack fuel. The further you go the more money you earn for upgrades.

Upgrade your jetpack and your run to travel further and beat your high score.

How far can you reach?

Jetpack Hop features:
- Simple and addictive tap and hold gameplay
- Upgrades to unlock
- Colourful art style
- Offline earnings to collect
